metadata.title: CVE-2018-1064 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libvirt version before 4.2.0-rc1 is vulnerable to a resource exhaustion as a result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-5748 that affects QEMU monitor but now also triggered via QEMU guest agent.

criterions.comment: libvirt package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.0-1ubuntu2').
